XX1 Lite - Movie Streaming App

Brief: XX1 Lite is your portal to a world of cinematic wonder, designed to provide a seamless movie-search experience without storing any movie files directly. Access the latest offerings in movies, anime, cartoons, Korean dramas, and American TV series, refreshed daily for endless entertainment at your fingertipsâ€”all for free!
